column5: My driveshaft broke in my  57 johnson. it sheard right at the point where it goes into the engine. would someone out there be able to tell me where to go to find a new shaft! thanks
im sure theres lots of them laying around BUT ,would this not be a great time to upgrade to something alot newer,easier on fuel and the waterways,I mean its only 52 yrs old
i've got a 1960 Evinrude 18hp, $120 runs rough...  long ways from alberta though...
I agree, it's time to get something that is MUCH better on water pollution. Those old motors were the worst thing for our water quality.  I would say a new 4 stroke would be the way to go
